review: Item delivered on time, was as described. Trusted seller. Thank you....
author: Citylights

review: I absolutely love this. It's easy to use, barely has any lag, and it's a powerful little stick. Well worth the money. Hulu, Netflix, and Twitch work excellent. Streams really well, and tons of apps to get.
author: Josh

review: Love the fire TV stick. Wish I could get more games but it's literally everything you could need for streaming.
author: Kristina McKennon

review: Unable to get the internet on this item
author: Thomas C. Vought II

review: I was a little disappointed.  I guess I was expecting more from this product than what I got.  I did not realize I would have to pay for most everything I want to use on here.  The product itself is excellent just didn't realize I couldn't get more from it.
author: Stacey Stockman

review: I installed this on my bedroom TV. So far I have only used it to watch Netflix. It's easy to use and works great.  Definitely worth the price!
author: Amy S

review: Best purchase ever! I pay 1/3 what my cable used to be and I get customized content. The set up was simple and the picture is great.
author: john hubbard

review: Love it, had Chromecast already. The interface is nice, very easy to navigate. The remote is a huge plus. I would say this is better than Chromcast due to that interface and the integration of Prime movies, tv, etc. Only function I like from Chromecast that I miss is being able to stream content from my phone directly to the TV. Still, very happy with the purchase
author: J. Forsythe
